sentences.sentence: A hatred that scores the face of every swallow-burrowed scarp, nourishes the root of every fruit tree, and supercedes all other loyalties and enmities.
sentences.translation: 这种仇恨刻在每一个燕子筑巢的绝壁上，滋养着每一棵果树的根系，取代了其他一切的忠诚和敌意。

sentences.sentence: This ability supercedes intelligence, talent, and connections in determining the size of your salary and the speed of your advancement.
sentences.translation: 这种能力代替智力，才能，关系成为你的薪水大小和升职速度的决定因素。

sentences.sentence: This template supercedes all the templates in the following list.
sentences.translation: 这个模板取代所有下列表中的模板。
